titleStmt.title: Man's chief end to glorifie God, or, Some brief sermon notes on I Cor. 10:31 by the reverend Mr. John Bailey.
titleStmt.author: Bailey, John, 1644-1697.

titleStmt.title: Man's chief end to glorifie God, or, Some brief sermon notes on I Cor. 10:31 by the reverend Mr. John Bailey.
titleStmt.author: Bailey, John, 1644-1697.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Samuel Green and are to be sold by Richard Wilkins,

notesStmt.note: "To my loving and dearly beloved Christian friends..." appears on its own at reel 2301:13, and is identified as Wing B449.
Imperfect: Pages faded, stained, tightly bound and torn with some loss of print.
Reproduction of originals in the Harvard University Library and the Congregational Library..
With: (at reel 1415:1) To my loving and dearly beloved Christian friends, in and about Lymerick. [Boston? : s.n., 1684?]
